name: RHSleep
0:
”Alexa, tell RH Sleep to list my products.”
”Alexa, tell RH Sleep to set heat of both sides to maximum”
”Alexa, tell RH Sleep to turn on both sides”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: r. h. sleep
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ask Alexa to manage heat levels and duration of your Royal Heritage Home heating blankets, throws, and mattress pads.
